title: Define Campaign KPIs
description: During the planning phase, a strategist needs to define the Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for a new brand awareness campaign.

tasks.description: Review the primary campaign objective: 'Increase Brand Awareness'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the goal of the campaign.

tasks.description: Select KPIs that align with an awareness goal, rather than a direct-response goal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses metrics like Impressions, Reach, and Video View Rate instead of conversions.

tasks.description: Set a target for each KPI (e.g., 'Achieve 5 million impressions').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets clear, measurable goals for the campaign.
